comments.body:
This looks like it could be `noarch: python`. See:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/knowledge_base.html#noarch-python

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +10,14 @@  sha256: b1e58dbcf50fbb2c9c418ec7a6057f0cdb30b8f822ac852f72e71ba769dae8c5

build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
